amendment.description: To regulate large capacity ammunition feeding devices.

action.text: Amendment SA 714 proposed by Senator Blumenthal for Senator Lautenberg.

vote.text: Amendment SA 714, under the order of 4/16/13, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 54. Record Vote Number: 103.
